name: Mages 'n Monsters
description:
Mages 'n Monsters is a 3D top-down bullet-hell shooter!

This is no ordinary shoot 'em up game, but pure chaos Test how good you really are.

Controls

  • W A S D - Walk
  • SPACEBAR - Dash
    • hold to aim your dash location with your mouse

  • Left mouse: fast directional shooting

  • Right mouse: slow unidirectional shooting

Hardware Requirements

Due to the number of active objects at once it can be a bit more demanding.

  • OS: Linux 64bit or Windows 64bit
  • RAM: >1GB
  • GPU: GTX560ti or newer
